Richard Yarde (1939-2011) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na prọfesọ, ónyé ọkachamara na eserese mmiri.
Nné na nnà Richard Yarde bụ ndị mbịarambịa
Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-arụzi ígwè na nné ya bụ ónyé na-akwa akwa

Ọ chetara nke a dị ka isi iyi nke mkpali, na-ekwu na e nwere ụkpụrụ n'ebe niile. Ọgwụgwọ bụ isiokwu a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ ya ma o si na ihe oyiyi sitere na nyocha X-ray nke ya. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe osise mmanụ, wee gbanwee na mmiri na 1977 ma nweta otuto ozugbo màkà ọrụ ya nke sitere na isiokwu nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na America, akụkọ ezinụlọ Yarde, na ọgụ ya na nkụchi akụrụ na ọrịa strok.
Yarde kụziri nka na Mahadum Boston, Wellesley College, Amherst College, Massachusetts College of Art, Mount Holyoke College, Mahadum Massachusetts na Boston
Site na 1999-2011, ọ bụ prọfesọ nkè nka na Mahadum Massachusetts na Amherst.
Richard Yarde rụrụ ọrụ na ihe na-enweghị mgbaghara - watercolor

Ọ na-ekwu na "Mmiri na-acha ma ọ bụ na-aga nke ọma ma ọ bụ ọ naghị aga, dịka ịwa ahụ". Ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya, ọ ga-etinye onwe ya n'ihe ize ndụ na ọ nwèrè ike ọ gaghị enwe ihe ịga nke ọma na agba nke mbụ
Yarde na-emekarị ihe, mgbè ụfọdụ mgbé ọ na-ege egwu jazz
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya buru oke ibu maka onye na-ese ihe na mmiri, irí site na irí ụkwụ ma ọ bụ karịa
Ọrụ ya na-agbagha eziokwu ahụ bụ na ihe osise mmiri kwesịrị ịbụ obéré, nsụgharị márá mma nke ala ma ọ bụ okooko osisi

Ihe osise Yarde dị oke egwu nke na-egosipụta isiokwu onwé ónyé na-emetụ n'ahụ, o gosipụtara isiokwu ndị a site na iji ihe a na-akọwa dị ka translucent na temporal. Yarde sikwa n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe ndị dabeere na ọdịbendị dị iche iche, nke na-akpụzi ọrụ ya n'otú o si aghọta ụwa
Yarde nwere gallery na-egosi dabere na isiokwu a.
